original_text: and assembling all the chief priests and scribes of the people, he inquired of them where the Christ was to be born.
korean_text: 왕이 모든 대제사장과 백성의 서기관들을 모아 그리스도가 어디서 나겠느냐 물으니

sentences.original_text: and assembling all the chief priests and scribes of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 백성의 모든 대제사장과 서기관들을 모아서

sentences.original_text: where the Christ was to be born.
